title: Fullstack Developer - Yunus Emre Coşkun
description: Fullstack Developer from Turkey. Specialist in .NET, Angular, SQL, Docker and CI/CD.

hero.title: Hello, I'm Yunus Emre Coşkun!
hero.description: I specialize in .NET, Angular, SQL, Docker and CI/CD. I develop scalable web applications.

jobs_description.title: Freelance Fullstack Developer
jobs_description.description: Working independently on various projects. Developing enterprise-level applications using .NET Core, Angular, SQL Server and modern web technologies. Creating custom solutions for client needs.

jobs_description.title: Software Developer - VakıfBank
jobs_description.description: Worked at VakıfBank, one of Turkey's leading banks, on corporate banking systems. Developed scalable and secure financial applications using .NET Core, Angular, and SQL Server.

jobs_description.title: Software Developer - Anssoft
jobs_description.description: Worked as a Full Stack Developer at Anssoft. Developed enterprise web applications using .NET, Angular, and SQL technologies. Gained experience in project management, code quality, and team collaboration.

projects.title: Blogium
projects.description: Medium alternative blog platform. Built with TypeScript, modern and user-friendly interface.

projects.title: Med Antalya
projects.description: Health tourism platform. Patient and doctor matching service with modern and user-friendly interface.

projects.title: NeoVakıf - Banking System
projects.description: Modern banking application. Includes user operations, customer management and transaction features.

contributions.title: Open Source Projects
contributions.description: Contributed to various open source projects. Actively participated in TypeScript, Go and .NET ecosystems.

contributions.title: Community Work
contributions.description: Actively participating in software communities. Writing blog posts and preparing technical documentation.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Freelance Fullstack Developer creating enterprise web applications
about.description: Working independently on various projects. Previously held Full Stack Developer positions at VakıfBank and Anssoft. Expert in .NET Core, Angular, SQL Server, Docker, and CI/CD technologies. I develop secure, performant, and scalable web applications at the enterprise level. I value clean code principles, SOLID principles, and best practices. Proficient in Agile methodology and team collaboration.

contact.title: Ready to make your dreams come true?
contact.subtitle: I can boost your project or be part of your team
